intro-subtitle-top: Rent a power bank when you need it, charge your device anywhere, anytime and return it easily
intro-bottom-title: Stay connected at any time with this handy charger!
why-card-text: Can charge phone without having to leave it somewhere
Can focus on their tasks and refer to the station for charging needs
Is being presented in our app with thousand of weekly users
form-fb-title: Get a power boost for your people today
form-fb-subtitle: Complete an application to install a charging station at your location and we'll get back to you with details.
form-checkbox: I agree to QRCharge Terms and Conditions
rent-title: Increase your awareness and enable our users to explore your location, which could lead to new clients
station-fb-subtitle: We will install the station for free
slide-station-fb-desc: Restaurants, bars, coffee shops, conference venues, and front desks are ideal locations for our compact stations
download-title: Download QrCharge app from App Store or Google Play
